title: Quick Transmigration: Doomsday If You Don’t Fall in Love - Novel Updates
tags: Calm Protagonist   Cultivation   Female Protagonist   Gods   Interdimensional Travel   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Multiple Realms   Transmigration   World Hopping   World Travel
author: 南柯十三殿
description:
Li Hong refused the courtship of a demon god, and as a result, the world was destroyed. In order to save the world, she had to go to other worlds to coax back the broken glass heart of the demon. And the only way to get him back is to make every piece of his divided soul 'get what he wants.'

Li Hong: This is so fucking stupid.>
